quotes.quote: Life is so magical, mysterious, magnificent, and peaceful.
Own your magnificence. The world needs your brilliance and grace.
When you realize your own magnificence, you will only attract magnificence in your life.
If people aren't able to see your magnificence, that's their loss, not yours.
The magnificent cause of being, the imagination, the one reality in this imagined world.
Her magnificence is deeper than skin.
Only if you have been in the deepest valley, can you ever know how magnificent it is to be on the highest mountain.
You can only embrace the magnificence of your own reality when you stop envying the moments on her highlight reel.
It's such a magnificent thing to be able to love someone and expect nothing from them.
Be magnificent. Life's short. Get out there. You can do it. Everyone can do it. Everyone.
There are three things we cry about in life, things that are lost, things that are found, and things that are magnificent.
Let us remember that within us there is a palace of immense magnificence.
The most magnificent being you'll ever be is you.
Find magnificence in each moment.
Your magnificence has made me a wonder. Your charm has taught me the way of love.
Reality can be magnificent even when life is not.
Limitless is your potential. Magnificent is your future.

Magnificence is likewise a source of the sublime. A great profusion of things which are splendid or valuable in themselves is magnificent. The starry heaven, though it occurs so very frequently to our view, never fails to excite an idea of grandeur.
The winners in life treat their body as if it were a magnificent spacecraft that gives them the finest transportation and endurance for their lives.
People are inherently good. Our souls are magnificent and capable of extraordinary performance.
You already are the magnificence that you seek.
There are couple of ways to avoid death, one is to be magnificent.
A cause may be inconvenient, but it's magnificent. It's like champagne or high heels, and one must be prepared to suffer for it.
Knowledge is beautiful but wisdom is magnificent.
It is the restraint of patience that yields the magnificent in life.
The more we can purge ourselves of these diseases we create, the more we can become magnificent people.
The moment one gives close attention to any thing, even a blade of grass it becomes a mysterious, awesome, indescribably magnificent world in itself.
Just be in love. Life is such a magnificent art, so shield it with love.
I am who I am because the tears of my past have watered the magnificence of my present.
The time to embrace your magnificence is now.
